title: It's been 3 years and 4 months since Taric last got a new skin.
body: I mean, I know he isn't the most popular champion. But that's a LONG time - it may be the longest. Think it's about time he got SOMETHING.

replies.body: He's getting a rework, complete with visual update. No new skins until then at the earliest.
Yup, this is correct! Since he's getting a visual update, we're going to hold off on a new skin for Taric until his update is complete.
Ah, I don't keep up with League news like I used to. Good to know, thanks!

You don't keep up with League news? 

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/969beca6c0e80de21703f66acfdc8f76.jpg

hi TheeCandyMan!

hope it helps ^^

Pretty plox do whatever it takes to finish him soon.

The Paladin archetype has been my main character everywhere... EVERYWHERE in games and I can't wait for him.

It even angers me a bit knowing that poppy is going to be complete first >_<
